title: Bulletin
title-note: University of Minnesota, Industrial Relations Center
additional-note: The first copyright renewal we found specifically mentioning the Industrial Relations Center was for number 7, filed in the Books section of the CCE.  This issue, like others in this series, has a distinctive title. Before concluding an issue (either before or after this one) is in the public domain, search for book renewals for the issue under its distinctive title. We have not systematically searched individual issue titles.
acknowledgement: Thanks to Iren Sokolova for copyright research on this title.
